import React from 'react' import './Bag.css' import ul from '../../images/ul.png' export default function Bag(props) { const [count, setCount] = React.useState(0) const [count1, setCount1] = React.useState(0) if (count<0)setCount(0) if (count1<0)setCount1(0) return (
{props.bagOpen &&
{/* // onClick={props.bagClose}> */}

Shopping card

Show product details

$ 1999
